roleset.name: to acquire or maintain a monopoly of
roleset.note: MONOPOLIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'monopolize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from monopolize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` They do n't want Japan to monopolize the region and sew it up , '' says [*T*-1] Chong-sik Lee , professor of East Asian politics at the University of Pennsylvania .
